title: Could be a Black Mirror episode
review:
This is how a Black Mirror episode looked like if it was directed by Lanthimos. A bit slow in some point in the middle.
I failed in finding the moral message at the end, but surely it has.

title: Solo per i fan
review: Ritmo piatto. Storia scontata. Si salvano solo le canzoni.

title: Be able to sing would have helped
review: Being that the story doesn't exist and everything's on the shoulders of ABBA songs, woudn't it be a good idea to have someone that is really good in singing as part of the cast?In the end it is a masterpiece of 'trash'.
